sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' const Commentaire = props => { const initialFormState = { id: null, commentaire: ''} const [ user, setUser ] = useState(initialFormState) const handleInputChange = event => { const { name, value } = event.target setUser({ ...user, [name]: value }) } return (
{ event.preventDefault() if (!user.commentaire ) return props.addUser(user) setUser(initialFormState) }} >
